name: Horizons and Sierras - Raw 1 - 500 millions years ago
description: @lorenzogotuned Soundtrack sampled from "Snowglobes" by KUWAGO --- Fungus: Pleurotus eryngii  --- Three miniclips to show mycelium sample from a #fungi​ network. Filters and animations provide insights into networks formation via light absorption and reflection. The field light on the compound microscope provides the background where to apply different image processing techniques that allow exploration of network morphology. #STEM​ #STEAM​ #science​ youtube.com/watch?v=n0rtMy_ktlM
